title: Advanced Stats with Jacob Gibbs! What is "TPRR"?  (05/17 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
SportsLine Data Analyst Jacob Gibbs joins us to talk about targets per route run. This stat can help identity WR breakouts, so pay attention! After Jacob explains the stat, we have a trivia question for you about a young WR you shouldn't give up on just yet (6:55) ... News and notes (13:10)! What should we expect from Travis Etienne? And then let's highlight some TPRR standouts like A.J. Brown (18:18). Can he be WR1 in Fantasy? And Jacob will tell you why T.J. Hockenson and D'Andre Swift could be poised for big Fantasy seasons (26:40) ... Ja'Marr Chase (38:10) and Diontae Johnson (40:40) could be in line for heavy targets. Find out why we can compare Johnson to Michael Thomas. And finally, let's get into another advanced stat and talk about Najee Harris and how he fits in Pittsburgh (47:10) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCviK78rIWXhZdFzJ1Woi7Fg/videos

itunes:title: Advanced Stats with Jacob Gibbs! What is "TPRR"?  (05/17 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Jacob Gibbs joins us to talk about targets per route run and why you should be paying attention to this metric. We talk A.J. Brown, Diontae Johnson, a couple of Lions and more!
